alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL MERCER COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Celina. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Celina, Coldwater, Rockford, Wabash, Mendon, Montezuma, Neptune and Tama. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
